de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.generic

Class FreeSpecBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tobiasroeser.lambdatest.generic.FreeSpecBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LambdaTest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeSpec, FreeSpec

    public abstract class FreeSpecBase
extends Object
implements LambdaTest

    Common base class containing framework agnostic implementation of FreeSpec-like classes.

    See Also:
    FreeSpec, FreeSpec

      • withDefaultReporter

        public static <T> T withDefaultReporter(Reporter reporter,
                                        FreeSpecBase.F0WithException<T> f)
                                 throws Exception

        Executes a given function f with the default reporter set to reporter, and restored the previous default reporter afterwards.

        Parameters:
        reporter - The default reporter to be used while executing f.
        f - The function to apply.
        Returns:
        The return value of the function f.
        Throws:
        Exception - All expeceptions thrown by f.

      • getExpectFailFast

        public boolean getExpectFailFast()

      • setExpectFailFast

        public void setExpectFailFast(boolean failFast)
        Description copied from interface: LambdaTest

        If true, the first failed assertion will also fail the test. If false, the test runs as long as possible, potentially collection multipe failed assertions.

        Specified by:
        setExpectFailFast in interface LambdaTest
        Parameters:
        failFast - If true, to fail fast.

      • test

        public void test(String name,
                 RunnableWithException testCase)

        Adds a test to the test suite.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new test.
        testCase - The test case. It should return when it is successful, else it should throw an exception. Depending on the underlying test framework/runner, there are different exceptions types, which are recognized and handled. See in the concrete implementation documentation for more details.

      • getTestCases

        public List<DefaultTestCase> getTestCases()

      • intercept

        public <T extends Throwable> T intercept(Class<T> exceptionType,
                                         RunnableWithException throwing)
                                  throws Exception

        Intercept exceptions of type <code>exceptionType</code> and fail if no such exception or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown.

        Specified by:
        intercept in interface LambdaTest
        Parameters:
        exceptionType - The exception type to intercept.
        throwing - The execution block which is expected to throw the exception.
        Returns:
        The intercepted exception.
        Throws:
        Exception - If no exception was thrown or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown.

      • intercept

        public <T extends Throwable> T intercept(Class<T> exceptionType,
                                         String messageRegex,
                                         RunnableWithException throwing)
                                  throws Exception

        Intercept exceptions of type <code>exceptionType</code> and fail if no such exception or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown or it the message does not match a given pattern.

        Specified by:
        intercept in interface LambdaTest
        Parameters:
        exceptionType - The exception type to intercept.
        messageRegex - A regular expression pattern to match the expected message. See Pattern for details.
        throwing - The execution block which is expected to throw the exception.
        Returns:
        The intercepted exception.
        Throws:
        Exception - If no exception was thrown or an exception with an incompatible type was thrown or if the message of the exception did not match the expected pattern.

      • pending

        public void pending()
        Description copied from interface: LambdaTest

        Marks the test as pending. Instructions after pending() will not be executed.

        Specified by:
        pending in interface LambdaTest
